website_summaries.verdict: Versatile size and impressive picture quality put this updated VIZIO TV at the top of our shortlist.
pros: 55-inch size is practical for medium to large rooms
Owners brag about the true-to-life colors it produces
Part of the purchase price of the Red series goes to help HIV research
cons: Software has been known to have a few issues

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 4K TV that won't break the bank.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent 4k TV for under a grand. The picture quality is amazing, especially if you are a gamer. Playing Red Dead Redemption 2 on this set is and that alone was worth the purchase price. This is my first 4K TV and I am very satisfied with the purchase, really the only complaint I have is that the speakers on this TV are kinda on the average side. Though nothing a decent sound bar can fix. You won't have to take out a second mortgage to buy this, so that's always a plus
customer_reviews.author: Spudcommando

customer_reviews.title: Superb picture quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This tv is amazing. Picture quality is beautiful. The price was so much cheaper then anywhere else. The only little thing I dont like is if you want to use the casting features or the streaming features of the tv, you have to agree to let them track your watching habits. If you are ok with that, and I think all tvs nowadays do this, then it's amazing for the price. Other then that, which can be bypassed with a fire stick or something, then it is a perfect buy.
customer_reviews.author: nathan whalley

customer_reviews.title: Wow, that was easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in and it walked me through the initial setup quickly and then did a firmware update. Once I got my new 4k Blu-ray connect I put in a calibration disk and started on that process only to find that selecting the "Calibrated Dark" picture mode on the TV appeared to automatically calibrate the TV correctly. I walked through all the calibration tests and found no significant deviations except for needing to reduce the contrast slightly. This is a great TV right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: MrRat

customer_reviews.title: Socially responsible & great tech!
customer_reviews.text: Great cause, great TV and it works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: W. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture!
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV! I can’t say enough wonderful things about it. BEAUTIFUL picture and quality for a non-OLED TV. The installers couldn’t believe how impressive this TV was for the price. I am so thankful I was able to get it on sale for $699 for Black Friday. If you’re looking for a great quality TV for a great price, I’d highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Kosak

customer_reviews.title: Great tv. Awful remote
customer_reviews.text: This tv is great. And the red bezel is fantastic. Great looking tv even when off. But... I hate the remote. I bought a different vizio remote with a keyboard on the back. Its a little better. But. You can't zoom on Netflix. This tv won't let you. I watch a LOT of Star Trek and like zooming in so it's not in letterbox mode. But this tv doesn't allow it. Thank god the picture qualilty is mind blowing (if you pay the 4k upcharge on netflix). Watching blue planet in 4k is absolutely fabulous. Itd be nice if more content was in4k.
customer_reviews.author: BMXmike78

customer_reviews.title: This is the best TV at this price, you won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before settling on this TV and I have not been disappointed. The picture is fabulous, the sound is great, it’s a beautiful set, and I haven’t been this happy with a purchase in ages. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!
customer_reviews.text: This Vizio has a a fabulous picture with color and contrast that are startlingly realistic. Settings are much more than adequate to setup the ideal viewing choices you want. 4k sharpness is much better than the 4k TV we had before. No pop-ups or ads in the Smart TV pages. Privacy settings are controllable. Once you are used to the remote, all works very sensibly. Very glad we made this choice. Also considered Samsung and LG models before choosing this Vizio.
customer_reviews.author: Doug77

customer_reviews.title: Best 4k TV under $1,000 peroid!
customer_reviews.text: After about one month of research this is the I've settled on. First off I strictly purchased this TV for gameing. The response time is one of the fastest I've tested even in 4k. The picture is amazing and hdr content is even better. It also looks stunning with it's red accents. If your buying this TV for the smart TV functionality then don't. It's slow and awkward. There is no gameing tv under $1,000 that even comes close to this set. Definitely buy the red one if u can.
customer_reviews.author: Levi The Kid

customer_reviews.title: Great TV but...Quality Control Issues
customer_reviews.text: This was my first online TV purchase, and this particular TV would've been perfect (after calibration) if not for an issue with a spot of dead pixels in the corner of the screen which seem to be spreading with use. I have since returned the TV and hope to find another as replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had the tv about 5 months and love it. It was super easy to set up & we love the smart features it has. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Kajdas

customer_reviews.title: Remote was remedial
customer_reviews.text: P series Visio has Always served myself well , I’ve owned 3 Each one magnificent !
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picture
customer_reviews.text: Love the picture on this TV. Hard to beat for the price. The sound on the TV is bad but doesn't matter to me since I use a sound bar
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Slosson

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful TV, great features. A little on the slow side in some apps, but overall this TV has a gorgeous build quality and excellent black levels.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Ummm YES!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Vizo!! And I absolutely LOVE it! I was a loyal Samsung consumer and well I think they may converted me. The price is pretty fair. The color as well as the picture quality is amazing! It think it’s great partnering up with Partner Red! The red trim on this adds a little pop to the wall so I’m definitely enjoying the red. I just needed a little flair to my wall. Why not doing it with the tv?!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Bui

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Look & Great Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great-looking TV, UHD with excellent Picture Quality. Works with Amazon Alexa & the Google Assistant .Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sanaz S

customer_reviews.title: Vizio and RED!
customer_reviews.text: Vizio always has the best looking TVs at great prices. Partnering with RED makes it even better with its social cause!
customer_reviews.author: Owen Egan

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed, absolutely love this TV
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I love Vizio. This is not my first Vizio TV, so when I was ready for an upgrade, of course I bought another one. I am obsessed with this TV! It’s so clear, the graphics are amazing. I love it so much, I ordered a second one for my parents for Christmas. This TV will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Galloway

customer_reviews.title: I am waiting on my t.v to find service!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I didn't by the red series vizio p but I am so mad at my vizio p right now I am writing this review! There's not alot to say other then while I am typing this I am waiting on my t.v to come on. That should answer your questions. The $250 t.v in the living room that works with Alexa works better then this one!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

product_meta.title: (VIZIO) RED P-Series 55” Class 4K HDR Smart TV (2018)
product_meta.description: At VIZIO, we are contributing to a better tomorrow. Part of every purchase of the (VIZIO)RED P-Series 55” Class 4K HDR Smart TV will go to fight AIDS with (RED). And with more than a billion colors, superior HDR performance, and sharp contrast in each frame, this RED P-Series TV also delivers serious smarts: VIZIO Smart Cast makes discovering and streaming high-quality 4K HDR video incredibly easy. And support for Alexa and Google Assistant makes this P-Series a perfect smart-home centerpiece. When you shop (RED), you’re a powerful advocate in the fight against HIV/AIDS. Join us and the fight to end AIDS.
feature_bullets: Dolby Vision HDR: premium 4K HDR picture with a dramatically expanded range of color, contrast, and brightness in every pixel
Ultra color spectrum: delivers over 1 billion colors, displaying every hue and tone with impeccable accuracy for a vivid and beautiful picture
Ultra bright 1000: with up to 1000 nits of peak brightness, this P series TV produces a astonishing range of Luminance, making water shimmer and fire flicker with intense realism
VIZIO watchfree: over 100 live and Internet streaming channels absolutely free, Live news, movies, movies, sports, comedy, music and more. No fees, subscriptions or logins
VIZIO Smart TV: finding great content and streaming high-quality 4K HDR Video is incredibly easy with VIZIO SmartCast. Browse favorites right on the TV using the remote or SmartCast mobile app
Connectivity technology: Built in WiFi, 5 HDMI, USB, Ethernet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars30 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
